userStoryPaths.label: a First Nation Representative
userStoryPaths.preText: and I'm interested in

user_story_paths.label: learning more about the province or a specific area of B.C.
user_story_paths.preText:
Great! You can choose between different types of areas from Communities and Unincorporated Areas, First Nations land and Reserves, Regional District to larger Economic Regions or Tourism Regions.

What kind of area would you like to look at?

I would like to like at

user_story_paths.label: discovering insights and patterns among BC communities
user_story_paths.preText:
We have a criteria search that has many types of filters to help you narrow down specific areas of BC that matches your criteria.

Would you like to try it?

user_story_paths.label: comparing an area to another one
user_story_paths.preText: Our tool lets you compare different types of areas to each other or to the B.C. average. You can select the types of area (such as Communities, Reserves, Regional Districts, Economic Regions, and much more) and the specific areas you want to compare.

user_story_paths.label: promoting an investment opportunity in my community
user_story_paths.preText: Would you like to go to the Community Investment Opportunity Tool?

userStoryPaths.label: an Investor
userStoryPaths.preText: and I'm interested in

user_story_paths.label: viewing Investment Opportunity matching my criteria
user_story_paths.preText:
We have a tool you might like to check out: our Community Investment Opportunity Tool. Our tool helps you find properties that meet your site selection criteria for your next investment into B.C. You can search for industrial, commercial, and agricultural properties by size, site servicing, labour force, and more.

Would you like to go to the Community Investment Opportunity Tool?
